talk.title: Advancing Practical Quantum Computing
talk.abstract: An overview of IBM Quantum's latest research initiatives and practical applications of quantum computing for industry and academia.

name: Elías F. Combarro
title: Advisory Board - Spain Representative, CERN Quantum Technology Initiative | Associate Professor, University of Oviedo, Spain

talk.title: Quantum Technology: European Perspectives
talk.abstract: An insight into CERN’s Quantum Technology Initiative and Europe's growing ecosystem in quantum research and development.

name: Frank C. Zickert, PhD
title: Quantum Algorithm Engineer and Trainer
bio: Specialist in developing quantum algorithm solutions and mentoring quantum enthusiasts.

talk.title: Applied Quantum Algorithms for Developers
talk.abstract: A hands-on look at implementing and training real-world quantum algorithms using open-source tools.

name: Gregory (Greg) Skulmoski
title: Associate Professor, Faculty of Society & Design, Bond University
bio: Expert in research methods, innovation, and quantum technology education.

talk.title: Bridging Research and Quantum Innovation
talk.abstract: Insights into integrating quantum technology and academic research to foster innovation and interdisciplinary learning.

name: Vivek Nainwal
title: Research Engineer, CDAC Hyderabad
company: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (CDAC)
bio: Quantum researcher from CDAC Hyderabad working on high-performance computing and quantum simulation.

talk.title: Quantum Research Initiatives at CDAC
talk.abstract: An overview of CDAC Hyderabad’s research efforts in advancing quantum computing and national HPC initiatives.

name: Abijeeth Teja
title: Engineer, CDAC Hyderabad
company: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (CDAC)
bio: Engineer from CDAC Hyderabad focusing on quantum algorithm development and system implementation.

talk.title: Building Quantum Computing Infrastructure
talk.abstract: Discussion on quantum software and hardware integration in India's growing quantum ecosystem.

name: Rahul Rana
title: Researcher, TCS Research
bio: Researcher at TCS exploring practical applications of quantum computing and AI integration.

talk.title: Quantum Meets Industry
talk.abstract: An exploration of how TCS Research is leveraging quantum computing to solve industrial and AI-related challenges.
